Interface ReviewService

All Superinterfaces:
Remote
All Known Implementing Classes:
ReviewServiceImpl
public interface ReviewService extends Remote
Remote interface for review-related operations in TheKnife system. This service handles creating, updating, and retrieving reviews and restaurant replies.
Author:
Lorenzo Radice

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    boolean
    createOrUpdateReview(ReviewDTO review)
    Creates a new review or updates an existing one.
    boolean
    deleteReview(String username, String restaurantId)
    Deletes a review.
    List<ReviewDTO>
    getReviews(String restaurantId)
    Retrieves all reviews for a specific restaurant.
    List<ReviewDTO>
    getUserReviews(String username)
    Retrieves all reviews created by a specific user.

  • Method Details

    • getReviews

      List<ReviewDTO> getReviews(String restaurantId) throws RemoteException
      Retrieves all reviews for a specific restaurant.
      Parameters:
      restaurantId - The ID of the restaurant
      Returns:
      A list of reviews for the restaurant
      Throws:
      RemoteException - If a remote communication error occurs

    • createOrUpdateReview

      boolean createOrUpdateReview(ReviewDTO review) throws RemoteException, SecurityException, IllegalArgumentException
      Creates a new review or updates an existing one. A user can only have one review per restaurant, so this method will update an existing review if the user has already reviewed this restaurant.
      Parameters:
      review - The review to create or update
      Returns:
      true if the operation was successful, false otherwise
      Throws:
      RemoteException - If a remote communication error occurs
      SecurityException - If the user does not have permission to review this restaurant
      IllegalArgumentException - If the review data is invalid

    • deleteReview

      boolean deleteReview(String username, String restaurantId) throws RemoteException, SecurityException
      Deletes a review. A user can only delete their own reviews.
      Parameters:
      username - The ID of the user attempting to delete the review
      restaurantId - The ID of the restaurant that was reviewed
      Returns:
      true if the review was successfully deleted, false otherwise
      Throws:
      RemoteException - If a remote communication error occurs
      SecurityException - If the user does not have permission to delete this review

    • getUserReviews

      List<ReviewDTO> getUserReviews(String username) throws RemoteException
      Retrieves all reviews created by a specific user.
      Parameters:
      username - The ID of the user whose reviews to retrieve
      Returns:
      A list of reviews created by the user
      Throws:
      RemoteException - If a remote communication error occurs
